00023 #ifndef __NITF_OBJECT_HPP__
00024 #define __NITF_OBJECT_HPP__
00025 
00026 #include "nitf/Handle.hpp"
00027 #include "nitf/HandleManager.hpp"
00028 #include "nitf/NITFException.hpp"
00029 
00030 namespace nitf
00031 {
00032 // Forward declarations so we can say we are friends
00033 class List;
00034 class HashTable;
00042 template <typename T, typename DestructFunctor_T = MemoryDestructor<T> >
00043 class Object
00044 {
00045 protected:
00046     //make the nitf containers friends
00047     friend class List;
00048     friend class HashTable;
00049 
00051     BoundHandle<T, DestructFunctor_T>* mHandle;
00052 
00054     void releaseHandle()
00055     {
00056         if (mHandle && mHandle->get())
00057             HandleRegistry::getInstance().releaseHandle(mHandle->get());
00058         mHandle = NULL;
00059     }
00060 
00062     virtual void setNative(T* nativeObj)
00063     {
00064         //only modify if it is a different native object
00065         if (!isValid() || mHandle->get() != nativeObj)
00066         {
00067             releaseHandle();
00068             mHandle = HandleRegistry::getInstance().template acquireHandle<T, DestructFunctor_T>(nativeObj);
00069         }
00070     }
00071 
00072 public:
00074     Object() : mHandle(NULL) {}
00075 
00077     virtual ~Object() { releaseHandle(); }
00078 
00080     virtual bool isValid() const
00081     {
00082         return getNative() != NULL;
00083     }
00084 
00086     bool operator==(const Object& obj)
00087     {
00088         return mHandle == obj.mHandle;
00089     }
00090 
00092     bool operator!=(const Object& obj)
00093     {
00094         return !(operator==(obj));
00095     }
00096 
00098     virtual T * getNative() const
00099     {
00100         return mHandle ? mHandle->get() : NULL;
00101     }
00102 
00104     virtual T * getNativeOrThrow() const throw(nitf::NITFException)
00105     {
00106         T* val = getNative();
00107         if (val)
00108             return val;
00109         throw nitf::NITFException(Ctxt("Invalid handle"));
00110     }
00111 
00120     std::string getObjectID() const
00121     {
00122         return FmtX("%p", getNative());
00123     }
00124 
00125     bool isManaged() const { return isValid() && mHandle->isManaged(); }
00126 
00133     void setManaged(bool flag)
00134     {
00135         if (isValid())
00136             mHandle->setManaged(flag);
00137     }
00138 
00139     std::string toString() const
00140     {
00141         return getObjectID();
00142     }
00143 
00144     void incRef()
00145     {
00146         mHandle->incRef();
00147     }
00148 
00149     void decRef()
00150     {
00151         mHandle->decRef();
00152     }
00153 
00154 };
00155 
00156 
00157 }

00179 #define DECLARE_CLASS_IN(_Name, _Package) \
00180     struct _Name##Destructor : public nitf::MemoryDestructor<_Package##_##_Name> \
00181   { \
00182       ~_Name##Destructor(){} \
00183       virtual void operator()(_Package##_##_Name *nativeObject) \
00184       { _Package##_##_Name##_destruct(&nativeObject); } \
00185   }; \
00186   \
00187   class _Name : public nitf::Object<_Package##_##_Name, _Name##Destructor>
00188 
00189 #define DECLARE_CLASS(_Name) DECLARE_CLASS_IN(_Name, nitf)
00190 
00191 #endif
